statements: SELECT user_id, product_suggestions, promotions FROM preferences WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT product_suggestions, promotions, user_id FROM preferences WHERE product_suggestions = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE promotions = FALSE;
SELECT user_id FROM preferences WHERE product_suggestions = TRUE AND promotions = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, promotions FROM preferences WHERE user_id = '87654321-4321-8765-4321-876543218765';
SELECT user_id, product_suggestions, promotions FROM preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, product_suggestions, promotions FROM preferences WHERE promotions = TRUE AND product_suggestions = FALSE;
SELECT promotions, user_id, product_suggestions FROM preferences WHERE product_suggestions = TRUE OR promotions = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(CAST(product_suggestions AS INT)), COUNT(*) FROM preferences WHERE promotions = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM preferences;
SELECT user_id, preference_name FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE preference_name = 'theme';
SELECT user_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences ORDER BY user_id ASC, preference_name DESC;
SELECT p.user_id, p.preference_name, p.preference_value, pr.product_name FROM preferences p JOIN products pr ON p.user_id = pr.user_id;
SELECT user_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE user_id=1
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category='electronics' ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(product_id) AS num_products FROM products GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_products > 5
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, category FROM products ORDER BY category
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT preference_name) AS num_preferences FROM preferences
SELECT * FROM preferences;
SELECT user_id, product_suggestions FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM preferences JOIN users ON preferences.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, product_suggestions FROM preferences WHERE promotions = TRUE;

SELECT user_id, username, email, product_name, category FROM preferences JOIN users ON preferences.user_id = users.user_id JOIN products ON products.product_id = preferences.user_id ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT preference_type, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE preference_type = 'theme';
SELECT user_id, preference_type FROM preferences WHERE preference_value = 'dark';
SELECT preference_type, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 3 AND preference_value = 'light';
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT preference_type, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE preference_type = 'theme';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM preferences GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM preferences WHERE preference_value = 'dark';
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 2 AND preference_type = 'language';
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE product_id = 3
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM preferences_history WHERE action = 'viewed'
SELECT promotion_id, promotion_name, discount FROM promotions WHERE promotion_id = 4
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT user_id, product_name FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users JOIN preferences ON users.user_id = preferences.user_id WHERE promotions = TRUE AND product_suggestions = FALSE;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category IN ('Electronics', 'Clothing') OR product_name LIKE '%shoes%';
SELECT promotions.promotion_name, promotions.discount, preferences_history.action FROM promotions JOIN preferences_history ON promotions.promotion_id = preferences_history.user_id;
